entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
